name: Swedish Flag Day
obverse: A flag flying in the wind. Below the flag is a wreath enclosing three crowns. Below the wreath is a plaque for an engraving.
description: Swedish Flag Day was the name of the National Day of Sweden prior to 1983. It is held on June 6 every year.
This particular medal is a miniature version of Ulla #231 and does not include the reverse inscription.
